verbs.description: goller (third-person singular simple present gollers, present participle gollering, simple past and past participle gollered)

examples: If all this were studied and practised, there would be fewer Preachers, and shorter Preachings, and fewer and shorter Prayers amongst Professors; they would not sleep and wake People, gasping and gollering, and few understanding what they are saying,  [â€¦]
